Blog

Virtual Vector Lab is about automatically identifying disease carrying insects to support treatment and refinement of niche models

Recent Activities

  • Coming Soon

Team

Virtual Vector Laboratory is a joint effort between The Information and Telecommunication Technology Center and The Biodiversity Institute at The University of Kansas.

Faculty

  • Perry Alexander (Co-PI ITTC)
  • Town Peterson (Co-PI BI)

Staff

Sponsors

Virtual Vector Lab is supported by the KU Research Investment Council.
